projectInfo.title: Project: What and Why
projectInfo.info:
We are pleased to introduce a powerful and user-friendly application that combines the functionalities of Postman and GraphiQL. This tool is designed for developers who need flexible and easy-to-use resources for working with APIs.

With our application, you can effortlessly send requests to RESTful and GraphQL APIs, select methods, configure headers, and instantly view responses.

The built-in request history will help you revisit and manage previously executed operations.

Access to the application is secured with authorization and authentication, ensuring a safe working environment.

Use our application to streamline your API work and make the process more convenient and efficient!

team.NastiaDesc: Frontend specialist with a great sense of design and attention to detail. Creates intuitive interfaces and enhances user interactions

courseInfo.title: RS School: React Course
courseInfo.info:
The NFS application is the final group project of the React course offered by RS School.

This course is designed for individuals who have completed Stage #2 of RS School and for new participants with solid skills in JavaScript, TypeScript, Git, and other key technologies.

The course covers a wide range of topics, from the basics of web development using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript to working with tools like Git, Webpack, Chrome DevTools, and Figma. It also includes principles of working with REST APIs and modern approaches to development using React.

All course materials are available on YouTube and GitHub, providing open access to learning. RS School offers free education, allowing anyone to share their knowledge and experience.

Upon successful completion of the course and all assignments, including the final project, an electronic certificate is awarded, recognizing the skills and knowledge gained.
